title: How to climb playing with inters
body:
How do i climb when every fucking time i get into promos i get swarmed with actual toxic inting trolls. Bro i just had a brand steal so much cs from me cus i went apc veigar instead of an adc. our ryze mid ended the game with 0 kills and like 13 deaths, our autofilled jg decided its best to keep ganking fed lanes instead of us bot lane where we actually still in the game. Used the excuse "I main mid," when he never mentioned being autofilled in champ select. Our top kat? well she fed the teemo to death, dont let her kda trick you. she fed and then got some kills. my brand? 3-14.

Please, this keeps happening. WHAT the fuck do i do?? I have been in promos to silver like 4 times now, and only 1 of those times do i remember actually having teams that matched up well. Why am i getting trolls almost always. Why am i getting new iron players facing off against an almost fully loaded silver team? I get it, not that big of a difference in skill. Well wtf. I got infants on my team against toddlers. I fuckin bet the toddlers gonna whoop the infants ass.

Like where do i go from here?

replies.body:
https://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/NA1/3210051052/2125522108558048?tab=overview
https://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/NA1/3209974660/2125522108558048?tab=overview

You dont do things like this.
Yep....I concur. There's just no excuse for feeding that much, ever.

I just wanted to point out where his teammates have a bad game he calls them inting trolls but when he has a bad game hes not an inter or a troll and he probably wont say "the enemy player x who i was against is the better player". So why does he hold it against his teammates but not himself.

> [{quoted}](name=Chainman3,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=70cxKeNW,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2019-11-24T02:06:51.367+0000)
>
> I just wanted to point out where his teammates have a bad game he calls them inting trolls but when he has a bad game hes not an inter or a troll and he probably wont say "the enemy player x who i was against is the better player". So why does he hold it against his teammates but not himself.

because i lost, i did not int. like i get the difference between unintentional and intentional, but pyke jumping 1 v 2 against fed opponents multiple times? thats inting. who the hell said i avoid putting blame on myself. I'm not here to discuss teammates having bad games, I am here to discuss actual trolls man. I'm in bronze, i have a lot of teammates who have shit games, do i report? NO. Stop acting like im going after the general population of people having bag games (INCLUDING ME). I am going after actual trolls, or players who don't want to cooperate and just want to do their own thing which costs the game.
So you're telling me if i was to watch the game where you did bad i wouldnt see questionable plays?

I am positive you will find shit on me. I am low elo after all, but i also guarantee that you will have a seizure from seeing the shit i am literally telling you guys about.
If you can watch some of my games, go ahead and do so. 

1. In fact I just finished a game where my zhao was inting and my nami was the most passive nami in the world. could not support if her life depended on it. (Tristana game)

2. Also, prior to that finished a game with a troll jg as well, Shaco. Literally funniest shit i've seen all my life. my top lane was absolute shit.(Tristana game)

3. Game before that had a sona who was useless, but in that game i did bad too (Varus game)

4. Game before that had Literally a troll supp. Not bad, but a troll. Veigar was taking all my cs had like 1 in 10 minutes in the game. Before you say learn to last hit or some smart ass shit, I would like you to understand a lvl 1-3 twitch with no items deals less aa damage than a veigar's q or w.  (Twitch game)

5. Game before that had a teemo supp, and it worked out fine. He didn't troll. I didn't do that bad, and we won game. (Sivir)

6. This game was kind of a mess, and i honestly can't tell you how i did because i don't remember. You can watch that game (Ashe Game)

Im not critiquing you as a player, im telling you to look at the way your portray yourself vs how you portray your teammates.

Just a quick example:

> Game before that had a sona who was useless, but in that game i did bad too (Varus game)

So sona is "useless" but you had a bad game. Why didnt you see me and sona were both useless? Or better yet me and sona had a bad game? Why did you label her as useless and yourself as having a bad game? 

I feel like you throw around the term "troll" and "inting" to anyone who is having a bad game.

Take for example these 2 statements:

>Game before that had Literally a troll supp. Not bad, but a troll

>Also, prior to that finished a game with a troll jg as well, Shaco

Why is one "literally a troll" and the other is just a "troll". Like you're using the term to describe a player who isnt playing how you want and theres like a degree of how off theyre playing compared to how you want them to play.

Simple, the sona was quite literally behind me half of that game. the other half she was talking shit to me because i confronted her about not poking or engaging with ult when jg came down. Useless as in not there in general. Had i know that should wouldve happened, i wouldve picked sivir and just played safe and had her go some other lane.


The two statements, one is Literally a troll because he planned on trolling from the start, no supp item, stealing all cs, and not cooperating about giving me my cs.

second statement means the jg was also trolling to some point, but i dont the same amount of evidence. I like how you keep coming after me, but why dont u just watch the games instead of coming at me using the vocab i use. shaco went and fed top lane(illaoi). didnt show up once bot(only ones ahead)
literally winning lane, but mumu ganks us 3 times in a row with no reward, but we couldnt push because of this. kept jinx in game through cs. this also basically gave them like the first two drakes. while this all happened shaco was top failing ganks, and continuously going back to the fed illaoi. Now i know what you're going to say. He is bad not a troll. well he started to troll later on in the game. would split push instead of joining team fights and would not appear for 1 drake or baron to contest. the one time he went to infernal. half of us were dead the other half were top lane. he died and they took it.

here's another troll lol. 

https://na.op.gg/summoner/userName=Mast3r+Giggles 
but amazingly he is also terrible at the game. Troll because he banned teammates champ, refused to cooperate and went afk after feeding.

this man has won 1 game in like the past 50 games. idk how i get teamed up with these dudes.

and my supp? dude sells his supp item.

Thats actually almost impressive to have that much of a loss % in solo Q.  

Whats more mind blowing to me is in that MASSIVE loss streak (1 win 41 losses in Solo Q), his MMR has actually stayed in the s4/bronze1 range when arguably it should have dropped to at least b3 b4 by now.
crazy ain't it? those people find their way into my games man. Our veigar and I were fed... all the dude had to do was split push and draw attention T_T

dont worry bro. i finally climbed to gold just this last season, experienced exact same problem as you. riot has been proven to lump you inters so u go on loss streak after win streak. For example me and my duo partner grinded hard to gold, he played his 100% wr kaisa and i played support. just after jumping one division and a 10 game winstreak, riot puts us with the worst, most tiltable teammates ever, and we go on loss streak (not tilt since games were spread out). just keep trying since riot gives u free wins if u lose promos alot. and pro tip:
NEVER TILT ON PROMOS
u lose one game on promos, exit lol immediately.

You can play twitch jg, or trist mid.  You already play veigar. 

Staying in bot lane and not climbing is just a self-fulfilling prophecy.   All of your supports are going to be complete garbage if not downright trolls at that Elo.  And even if you get some kills early, you are still going to be behind in xp to solo lanes.   

Top is also dead simple, and you can even play stuff like adc Trist, Quinn, Vayne top, tank Veigar top, Garen (apply face to keyboard), Mordekaiser, and Nasus.   All you have to do top is basically go even (don't die and farm), then show up to team fights and clean up with your level and gold advantage. It really doesn't matter what you play top/mid, just so long as you get the xp, cs,  and don't hard feed it is literally freelo.  But you do you...

Just look at your last four losses and who carried the game for the enemy team:

Top
Mid
Top
Top


It isn't so much about being a win condition yourself as taking away 50% of the enemy team's free win condition should they get fed.   Once you climb to ~ Gold 2 you can switch back to ADC and see how it goes.
lol funny thing is, i used to main top xD. got tired of it since i would always have to face adcs who could kite me while being superfed.
Bruh... I told you to get out of bot lane....

> [{quoted}](name=Modnar Erom,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=70cxKeNW,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2019-11-26T17:22:08.715+0000)
>
> Bruh... I told you to get out of bot lane....

i cant, ive invested a ton into it i have almost all adcs and such. Also, i am personally getting better whether my profile shows it or not. also new drake shit is meant for bot lane

I am mid game right now with a support who is literally taking my cs. Please look at his account and see the fuckin pattern of him taking all of his adc's cs.

https://na.op.gg/summoner/userName=Jays%C3%B3n

this is a fuckin troll. Dont tell me to improve my game when i have this cancerous shit in my fuckin game literally forcing me to fume.

Best advice is, if you want to climb, stay out of bot lane.   Ideally, you want top or mid and if you just focus on cs, not dying, and sound decision making you can easily climb to ~plat 4 by applying face to keyboard.  

You can also climb as jungle, but it is a more sophisticated role that involves more than just csing and not feeding.  But bot lane is not where you want to be.

pyke game, he trolled. he tried to 1 v 2 multiple times before i was in lane and each and every time. after that it was just hell. Yes i get it, get better. Believe me i do try, but i dont play as much as i used to. football just now ended for me. my games were much better  but anyways. How does this have to do with the trolls always being in promos
Dont look at my few terrible games and be like  " dont do this."
Thats just rude and ignorant. you being completely oblivious to all my other games.

It's not just "a few bad games". You do absolutely mediocre most of the time, and actually terrible quite often.

Here's one particular area where you're completely at fault: Your vision is ass-tier. You had a vision score of **15** on **ASHE**. In a 30 minute game. You had the champion who has the *easiest fucking time in the world getting a high vision score*, and you got about a point every 2 minutes.

I had a fucking Olaf with a **40** in the same amount of time. Olaf has no innate vision ability, Ashe does. You shouldn't have a *15* vision score as Ashe. There's just no excuse for that.

>How do i climb when every fucking time i get into promos i get swarmed with actual toxic inting trolls.

Step one: Stop thinking like this. Stop shifting the blame to your teammates. **Even if they are the reason you lost the match, they aren't the reason you can't climb**. And even if they lost you the match, you weren't perfect. Focus on how *you* can improve.

Plat smurfs blow through your rank with over a 60% winrate. *I* have over a 60% winrate at your rank and I'm mid-gold at best. So *improve* yourself instead of having a useless defeatist mentality.
